column4: Hey all i have a problem, Last night downloading i accidentally allowed the hard disk to fill , i rebooted and i couldnt log into gnome. I have cleared 500mb and now gnome loads but very very slowly any ideas?
Any ideas?
is it possible to post your output of "df -h"?
is it possible to post your output of "df -h"?
well, okay...do you have a seperate /home and /var?
so, everything is in /
well, that is (I hope) not important
try to use CLI and say "sudo aptitude clean"
who are you talking to?
ah, okay...was a bit confused
no worries...:)...we are here to learn
any changes to "df -h"?
okay...one last commad "du -sh /home"
okay, fair enough....well then...I hope it will start faster now...
with "aptitude --help" you will find out what the command just did...
well...my guess was, that gnome was not able to write into your home anymore (there is some space reserved for root on your harddisk), but...well...
cant say for sure...if it does NOT fix it, we have to find other solutions and causes
okay...just make sure you dont get too far over 90%
harddisk usage of course...the download is okay over 90%...;)
okay
welcome
great...:)
very welcome
